column2: IDEA-217968: Force DirectoryBasedStorage VirtualFile to be a directory

column3:
That will prevent an IOException such as '[...].idea/codeStyles' is not
a directory in VFS.
That fixes the Android Studio issue described in https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-217968#focus=streamItem-27-3614125.0-0
IDEA-217968: Force DirectoryBasedStorage VirtualFile to be a directory
